content: from website *when you re out and about this summer you ll need a tote to take everything to the beach or the boat or back from the grocery store this naturally beautiful bag will help you carry it off in style the soft crocheted cotton makes it comfortable to hold the flexible fabric lets you pack it full then fold it small when it s empty cotton tote designed by classic elite yarns increase one-size tote is crocheted in the round with single-crochet stitches recommended for beginners *
